issue.title: Upgrade Boundless SDK GXP library to the latest version
issue.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

* Upgrade Boundless SDK GXP library to the latest version 4.1 : http://boundlessgeo.com/solutions/solutions-software/software/
* Adapt EasySDI code where it is needed to work with this version.

**Fixed versions :** 4.2.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

@Bruno : to resolve

**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

Technical update to fix some Boundless SDK bugs.
Doesn't need any votes...

**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

I propose to classify such issue as enhancement instead of feature (doesn't need to be validated by Steering Committee)...
